location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Tod, Assistant Surgeon in Charge of the Bushire Residency to Captain Collinson, Commander of the HC Cruizer Mercury

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting that the Commander sends a party to board a Barein [Bahrain] boat that has recently arrived at the Bushire roads; it is believed that the boat is carrying cargo salvaged from the Nadree. If this is found to be true, it is noted that the Naquoda [Nakhoda] of the boat should be assured of remuneration for saving the cargo.
